did.unittitle: American Philosophical Society Archives. Record Group IIh
did.abstract:
This is part of the large inventory for the American Philosophical Society Archives. For complete information concerning this collection, please view the
Collection Description.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Phila., A.L.S. 2p. Asks if his uncle, R.J. Levis, had actually proposed him for A.P.S. membership. Refers to S.W. Roberts, C.C. Roberts.

did.unittitle: Letter to the American philosophical society;

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Camden, N.J., A.L.S. 1p., end. Cannot attend next Library Committee meeting.
